data.title: Are You Sick Of Knee Pain?
data.meta_description: It's easy to think knee pain "just comes with age", it's a bit of "wear and tear". You can't quite put your finger on why you're feeling the pain...
data.text:
Knee

Dr. Sabino Emil Cocos

PT, DPT, OCS

Co-owner of CoActiv Physical Therapy

Are You Sick of Knee Pain Stopping You From Doing Things?

Have you tried over and over to get rid of the pain, only to be let down each time? Do you want to go to the world again without worry or pain? If this sounds like you, keep reading to find out why CoActiv Physical Therapy is the best solution for you…

Don’t give up the way of life you want because of problems that can be fixed.

Have you been unable to stay active because of sharp knee pain?

Do you miss how easy it was to train for marathons?

Because of the pain, do you have to change your workout at the gym constantly?

We’re glad you’re here if this sounds like you, and we’re ready to help.

The BEST thing for you and your knee pain is to go to CoActiv Physical Therapy. Now is the time for US to help YOU get back to doing the things you love without pain or worry.

We know how hard it is to be active and do the things you want to do when your knees hurt.

You have goals because you are an active person. You want to do well.

You want to get stronger and move up in the gym.

You want to beat your record in a marathon race coming up.

You want to wake up and be able to go to exercise classes or take a walk around the block.

But since your knee pain has worsened, you must put your plans on hold.

You can’t train because your knee hurts. Instead, you must stay home and rest so the pain doesn’t worsen.

You can’t live like this.

You don’t want to be held back.

Instead, your plans are put on hold while your knee makes decisions for you every day.

Can't you still work out as hard as you'd like?

Does your knee keep you up at night and make it hard to sleep?

Are your workouts going on even when you're not there?

You feel like you’re missing out on life while dealing with knee pain.

Your self-confidence is fading by the second.

You want to get back out there, but this time you’ll be more vital than ever.

We can help with that.

At CoActiv Physical Therapy, we help you get back to doing the things you love to do without pain.

We help you reach your goals, get rid of pain, and get better at what you do.

Would you like to know more?

Ask about our hours and prices!

Here's the thing: if your knee hurts, you can try many different things to make it feel better. We've seen it all.

You may have tried…

A knee brace in the hopes that it will stop the pain

Other PTs who don't know how to treat your knee pain for sports or performance won't be able to help.

Putting on ice or heat

Taking a break from your favorite sports and activities that get you moving

Having a doctor tell you that the only way to fix your problem is to STOP working out and try surgery

You don’t want to quit. Surgery is not what you want. You shouldn’t miss out.

All of these choices lead to the same thing: temporary fixes.

We don’t offer short-term fixes.

So, here's the deal...

Some people have been told that their knee pain is because they are very active.

This is NOT true.

Your knee pain is getting in the way, which is a problem that needs to be fixed.

The fact is...

You shouldn't have to change the way you exercise.

You shouldn't have to miss games with the rest of your team.

You shouldn't have to sit around and do nothing when you could be getting stronger.

These things are NOT typical or important.

When you make an appointment with CoActiv Physical Therapy, your pain can and will be fixed.

You might wonder, “What makes CoActiv Physical Therapy different from the others?”

We’re not like the other people who tell you to…

Try painkillers to see if they help.

Knee braces should be suggested.

Ice or apply heat to the knee

Tell you to stay off your knee and let it rest until it feels better.

We don’t tell you this because we know that these are only short-term fixes, and we don’t do short-term fixes.

At CoActiv Physical Therapy, YOU are the most important thing to us. We can help you find solutions to get back to your routine, active life.

We want YOU to start working out again.

We want YOU to go back to training for your marathon and try to beat a personal record.

We want YOU to join your team back on the field or court.

And most of all, we want you to feel like yourself again.

The person who is strong, self-assured, and in charge of their life loves to live an active, pain-free life.

We’ll give you our word on that. We all know that time is the most valuable thing we have, so our goal is to help patients live pain-free, complete, and unrestricted lives.

You can trust that we want what is best for you. We listen to YOU and YOUR goals, and helping you reach those goals is our top priority.

We want to be a resource for coaches, athletes, trainers, and active people in the Bradenton area. We’re proud that we never stop trying to keep Bradenton healthy and pain-free.

Let’s work together to get rid of your knee pain for good.

Today, find out how much we cost and if we can help you.

You don’t have to sacrifice the runs you love over problems that can be fixed.

Sincerely,

Dr. Sabino Emil Cocos

Co-owner of CoActiv Physical Therapy

What Other People Just Like You Are Saying About CoActiv Physical Therapy in Manatee and Sarasota County

90+ 5-Star Reviews!

- Margaret Wright

★★★★★ 5/5

“I’m young at heart – not so much in the body that has taken it’s share of wear and tear in my 70 years. Sometimes I need guidance in helping me to achieve my goals. It is such a blessing to have quality therapists so conveniently located. Knowledgeable AND nice! Over the years of my various competitive sports I have needed good people to help my body perform at it’s peak. Yna & Sabino are GOOD! Willing and able to work WITH me and my competitive goals. Thank you both for your efforts to get me to peak performance. It’s Competitive Ballroom Dance, but the benefits spill out to the rest of life!”

- Destiny Carnes

★★★★★ 5/5

“Had an amazing session and honestly couldn’t believe the results. I’ve had chronic lower back pain for years. After reviewing how my body functions I was given a few exercises to do that would help with the pain and my overall body goals. I was then given a massage to work on my pain. It was different than any one I’ve experienced before as it truly targeted the pain. I figured it might help temporarily but I can say happily that my pain has went away. Total surprise that their technique would work so well. I can say my back has never felt better. The staff here was awesome. They will get you where you want to be and they are so nice. Give them a try and you won’t be disappointed.”
